content: can you tell me about the ascent to the good? did he say what affects such an act would have? your message cut off as well. you didnt finish the thought of purposiveness. and can you tell me why judgemental people could be difficult to deal with at times? and can you give more concrete evidence of the weed effects you described? what does it mean to be heightened in awareness? does that imply we're usually unaware of things? thats interesting isnt it? i exactly noticed and appreciated aspects of the game more than before! overlooking is unconscious right? i think you should be more positive about the email to graham. i know him a little bit closely. im sure he will appreciate it, i hope. have any philosophers talked about marijuana? i'd love to know many examples of philosophers and if you could elaborate on what they thought. please elaborate on everything you say, i really appreciate all of it.
